sentences.en: But Israel hass been taking in the take out should fluvial river water.
sentences.cn: 但以色列一直在抽取该河的河水.

sentences.en: Cultivated soil - forming parent material is mainly slope sediments , fluvial and alluvial materials.
sentences.cn: 耕地成土母质主要是坡积物 、 洪积物和冲积物.

sentences.en: Daxi conglomerate is massic carbonate conglomerate with high pebble content, well - sorted and well - rounded fluvial origin.
sentences.cn: 大溪砾岩为一套厚层碳酸盐质砾岩,具有砾石含量高, 砾石分选、磨圆较好的特点.

sentences.en: Fluvial sand body is one of the important reservoir in oil bearing basin.
sentences.cn: 河流相砂体是含油气盆地中重要的储油层系.

sentences.en: Highstand System Tract mainly develops depositional system of offshore - meare, fluvial facies and prograded delta.
sentences.cn: 高位体系域主要发育滨浅湖相 、 河流相及进积型三角洲沉积体系.

sentences.en: Introduced is a method for predicting sedimental sand body with fluvial facies.
sentences.cn: 介绍一种河流相沉积砂体预测方法.

sentences.en: Maintain fluvial health life, realize person and fluvial harmony coexist, must be kind to a river.
sentences.cn: 维护河流健康生命, 实现人与河流和谐共处, 必须善待河流.

sentences.en: Most other Dutch soil types are fluvial.
sentences.cn: 荷兰大多数其它土壤类型是沼生的.

sentences.en: Permeability heterogeneity in plane is an important characteristic of fluvial facies formation.
sentences.cn: 平面非均质是河流相沉积的重要特征.

sentences.en: The delayed response of sedimentation is a phenomenon commonly encountered in fluvial processes of rivers.
sentences.cn: 河床演变中普遍存在着滞后响应现象,而以往的水库泥沙研究对滞后响应现象很少考虑.

sentences.en: The latter is further sub - divided into gravelly and sandy braided fluvial facies.
sentences.cn: 其中辫状河可划分为砾质辫状河和砂质辫状河.

sentences.en: The main sedimentary system includes fluvial, delta, alluvial fan and lake facies.
sentences.cn: 主要沉积体系为河流 、 三角洲 、 冲积扇及滨浅湖相.

sentences.en: The unconformity marks the change from fluvial to marginal marine deposition.
sentences.cn: 不整合面标志着河相至边缘海相沉积的相变.

sentences.en: They measured the fluvial fulvic acid.
sentences.cn: 他们测量了河水的富里酸.

sentences.en: This provides precedent for facies - controlled modeling of complex block reservoirs of fluvial facies.
sentences.cn: 为河流相复杂断块油藏相控地质建模提供了先例.

words.tran_cn: 河流的；生在河中的；河流冲刷形成的

trans.tran_en: relating to rivers or caused by rivers
